game.name: Machine Made: Rebirth
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Machine Made: Rebirth is a classic fantasy/sci-fi RPG, you will play as Tibby, an angelic girl lost in a world of advanced technology, magic and corruption. Having lost her memories, Tibby must find a way to rediscover her history and her true self to overthrow the evil Machine God that threatens th
game.shortDescriptionEn: Machine Made: Rebirth is a classic fantasy/sci-fi RPG, you will play as Tibby, an angelic girl lost in a world of advanced technology, magic and corruption. Having lost her memories, Tibby must find a way to rediscover her history and her true self to overthrow the evil Machine God that threatens th

reviewHighlights.text: 무척 재미있는 게임이다. 하지만 아직 베타라서 비어있는 오디오 파일이 많아 게임진행이 어렵다. 파일 하나씩 개발자에게 메일을 보내 받아야 한다.
